name: Ext.util.Memento
doc: This class manages a set of captured properties from an object. These captured properties can later be restored to an object.

members.name: target
members.doc: The default target object for capture/restore (passed to the constructor).

members.name: constructor
members.doc: Creates a new memento and optionally captures properties from the target object.

params.name: target
params.doc: The target from which to capture properties. If specified in the constructor, this target becomes the default target for all other operations.

params.name: props
params.doc: The property or array of properties to capture.

members.short_doc: Creates a new memento and optionally captures properties from the target object. ...

members.name: capture
members.doc: Captures the specified properties from the target object in this memento.

params.name: props
params.doc: The property or array of properties to capture.

params.name: target
params.doc: The object from which to capture properties.

members.short_doc: Captures the specified properties from the target object in this memento. ...

members.name: remove
members.doc: Removes the specified properties from this memento. These properties will not be restored later without re-capturing their values.

params.name: props
params.doc: The property or array of properties to remove.

members.short_doc: Removes the specified properties from this memento. ...

members.name: restore
members.doc: Restores the specified properties from this memento to the target object.

params.name: props
params.doc: The property or array of properties to restore.

params.name: clear
params.doc: True to remove the restored properties from this memento or false to keep them (default is true).

params.name: target
params.doc: The object to which to restore properties.

members.short_doc: Restores the specified properties from this memento to the target object. ...

members.name: restoreAll
members.doc: Restores all captured properties in this memento to the target object.

params.name: clear
params.doc: True to remove the restored properties from this memento or false to keep them (default is true).

params.name: target
params.doc: The object to which to restore properties.

members.short_doc: Restores all captured properties in this memento to the target object. ...

short_doc: This class manages a set of captured properties from an object. ...
